timeline.message: Make sure that exercise groups are preserved on exam update
Save exerciseGroups as part of exam. Otherwise the order column won't get set correctly.

Update the delete functions of ExamResource & CourseResource
Now they delete all child elements first. Also updated the warning to make it clear that the exams will also be deleted
Fix null index column error: Use @JoinColumn instead of mappedBy as it is not support in combination with @OrderColumn
Ensure that exercise groups that exerciseGroups cannot be manipulated via POST exam
Refactor integration tests using exercise groups. We have to ensure that exerciseGroups are created via examRepository. Otherwise orderColumn won't work.
Use ExamAccessService in register student routes
Merge branch 'exam/management/follow-up-fixes' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into exam/management/follow-up-fixes

Fix delete operation for ExamResource
Now it successfully deletes an exam even if there is an exerciseGroup with exercises

Fix course delete operation
Now it handles courses with exams aswell
Merge branch 'exam/management/follow-up-fixes' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into exam/management/follow-up-fixes

timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: Using both @EntityGraph and @query is redundant. We should be able to delete one.
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: find instead of findOne. Return an Optional
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: Add new entity not found exception
